sentence: Rep. Tim Ryan’s (D) Ohio Senate campaign launched a $3.3 million ad buy, marking his first of the campaign cycle.
author: Julia Manchester
title: Tim Ryan launches $3.3 million ad buy

sentence: It is us versus China, and instead of taking them on, Washington is wasting our time on stupid fights," Rep. Tim Ryan, the clear front-runner in the Democratic Senate primary in Ohio, says in spliced-together clips from the campaign trail in his first TV spot.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: The Senate candidate who spotlights 'It is us versus China' in a new ad is a Democrat

sentence: "Rep. Tim Ryan's ad for his Ohio Senate campaign stirs up a racist pedagogy vis-à-vis China and makes Americans of East Asian descent vulnerable to attack," Shekar Narasimhan, AAPI Victory Fund chairman and founder, said in the statement.
author: Hannah Getahun
title: Democratic Rep. Tim Ryan criticized for 'sinophobic' campaign ad referencing 'Communist China'

sentence: Fox News contributor Marc Thiessen defended Democrat Rep. Tim Ryan on "America's Newsroom" Monday after the Ohio Senate candidate received backlash for a campaign ad where he criticizes China and calls for more U.S. manufacturing.
author: Fox News Staff
title: Marc Thiessen on Dem candidate being accused of anti-Asian hate for criticizing China: 'What a joke'

sentence: The winner of the primary will likely face Rep. Tim Ryan, D-Ohio, in the general election.
author: Tyler Olson
title: Ohio GOP Senate showdown: Gibbons hits Mandel on China in ad that returns to root of combustible feud

sentence: OH-Sen: Despite widespread condemnation of his first TV ad that blamed America's ills on China, Democratic Rep. Tim Ryan is back to the same theme in his newest spot, telling viewers, "We've gotta take on China" and "be Americans first."
title: rhetoric despite pleas from Asian Americans
